ygData.subject: Cygnar's negotiations and a notice.
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I m letting you know now that as of Wednesday, I m going away for 3 weeks. I ll be back the second of August or so.  On to my characters. They ll be left

OOC: I'm letting you know now that as of Wednesday, I'm going away for 3 
weeks. I'll be back the second of August or so.  On to my characters.  
They'll be left to the people interacting with them as of Wednesday assuming 
that they don't mind, except for Cygnar, who due to the fact that I expect 
his negotiations to be difficult and not done by then, I am loaning to a 
friend of mine.  The only slight drawback is that he's inexperienced and 
isn't currently a member of this group.  But I trust him completely to work 
it out.  I've been preparing for my trip which is why my posting has been 
sporadic.

::Cygnar::
       He briskly salutes Galvatron.  "Lord Galvatron.  I am off to speak 
with the Maximals about that treaty.  I shall return when I have gained the 
terms I seek."  He walks quickly out of the base and flies toward the Maximal 
base.

--part1_8a.1b3ff416.2a624108_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
